titles.title: Recognizing and congratulating Cal Ripken, Jr.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 10/2/1998--Introduced. Congratulates Cal Ripken, Jr., of the Baltimore Orioles for breaking Lou Gehrig's consecutive-games-played streak, establishing a new record of 2,632 games, and playing baseball with unparalleled grace, endurance, and skill, as Ripken said, "the only way I know."
